original_text: For I would that ye knew what great conflict I have for you, and for them at Laodicea, and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh;
korean_text: 내가 너희와 라오디게아에 있는 자들과 무릇 내 육신의 얼굴을 보지 못한 자들을 위하여 얼마나 힘쓰는지를 너희가 알기를 원하노니

sentences.original_text: For I would that ye knew
what great conflict I have for you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희를 위해 얼마나 큰 싸움을 하는지를

sentences.original_text: and for as many as have not seen my face in flesh
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 육체로 내 얼굴을 보지 못한 모든 자들을 위해서도
